issues.title: Target Audience Configuration System
issues.completion_notes: Backend API endpoint successfully serves YAML configuration with all predefined filters for audience targeting.
issues.test_results: All API endpoints tested and working - Returns complete audience configuration with all required filter categories (industries, roles, regions, platforms)

issues.title: Data Pipeline & API Backend
issues.completion_notes: Complete Data Pipeline & API Backend implemented. All scraping, results, history, leads bookmarking, and CSV export endpoints operational.
issues.test_results: All 9 REST API endpoints tested and working: POST /scrape, GET /results, GET /history, POST /history, GET /leads, POST /leads, DELETE /leads/:id, GET /download-csv, GET /health. Apify integration complete with mock fallback. JSON persistence functional.

issues.title: Professional Web UI Dashboard
issues.completion_notes: Professional Web UI Dashboard fully implemented with 3-column layout (dark sidebar, results table, detail panel) matching reference design. React + Vite + Tailwind CSS. All API integrations working.
issues.test_results: All features tested and working - Search form, Results table with pagination, Detail sidebar, Save lead feature, History tracking, CSV download, Full API integration (9 endpoints)
